basic.floral_language:
Fatsia japonica 
Floriography: sincere, lively, riches and honor
Fatsia japonica is evergreen four seasons. Plant stature is big. Leaves are green, larger, and nearly cordate. Blade edges split into eight angle, like the palm of the hand, thus is named as "eight stars gold plate". It can be planted in the park and artificial hills, also can be potted for beautification household. 
Fatsia japonica likes half overcast environment. Avoid direct sunlight. Two to three hours sunshine in winter. It may be flowering, and color is light yellow.
basic.blooming: Foliage plants, sometimes flowers, light yellow flowers

maintenance.soil: Peat or soil with specific nutrients
maintenance.sunlight: Like half shade, in winter may take 2-3h sunlight
maintenance.watering: Likes wet environments, water thoroughly when soil is dry
maintenance.fertilization: Dilute fertilizers following instructions, apply 1-2 times monthly in spring and autumn
